name: Super Knight World
description:
Super Knight World

An exciting retro adventure awaits you!

Travel to a pixelworld in 'Super Knight World' with beautiful and charming enemies, objects and nature. Defeat the baddies with your mighty sword. And collect all the gold and beat the highscore. Look and feel like in the good old days, when you played your favorite jump and run games on your 8bit console. Wonderful old-school music you know and love.


"Challenging-yet-simple 8-bit gameplay promises entertaining nostalgia!" - The Indie Game Mag"Jump & run in a NES flavour!"- Indie Retro News "Everything looks nice, everything sounds nice." - Indie Geek


There are two packages that you can choose from: Standard - Contains the game 'Super Knight World' at 0.99$
Receive all the fun that is in the game! You will get all future updates. Extra - Contains the game 'Super Knight World' and the level editor at 2.99$
You will be able to play the game, also you can edit existing level and add your own! You will get all future updates.

- developed by coffeemuggames (twitter), graphics by surt (opengameart.org/content/plattoon, opengameart.org/content/tux-bros)
